data.name: Skate or Don't!
data.detailed_description:
Skate or Don't! is a massively multiplayer online arcade skateboarding game. With support for over 1000 players in one game you can play with all of your friends and probably your whole twitch community. Featuring procedurally-generated courses and advanced fixed-point physics, every run is a different experience.

-Over 1000 players
-Join a server or host your own game
-Customize your skater and skateboard
-Learn flips and tricks
-Works with gamepad or keyboard

data.short_description: Skate or Don't! is a massively multiplayer online arcade skateboarding game. With support for over 1000 players in one game you can play with all of your friends and probably your whole twitch community. Featuring procedurally-generated courses and physics, every run is a different experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • OS: Linux 64-bit
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
